Agent

Class AntAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Agent.Agent
      • Agent.AntAgent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    QueenAgent, SoldierAgent

    public class AntAgent
extends Agent
    Representation of a worker ant.
